Language: Bulgarian, Czech, English, Estonian, Hungarian, Macedonian, Persian, Polish, Romanian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian
Description: This is Parallel corpus of George Orwell's 1984 and its translations.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from CLARIN.SI.

Corpus: Anthology of Middle English texts / Santiago Gonzalez y Fernandez-Corugedo
Description: This corpus contains literary texts from 1100 to 1400.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Language: Finnish, Karelian, Ludian, Latin, Swedish, Olonets, Izhorian, Votic
Description: This corpus contains poems from 1564 to 1939.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through Korp.

Corpus: ParFin 2016, Finnish-Russian Parallel Corpus of Literary Texts
Description: This corpus contains Finnish literary texts from 1990-2010 and their translations into Russian aligned at sentence level.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through Korp.

Corpus: ParRus 2016, Russian-Finnish Parallel Corpus of Literary Texts
Description: This corpus contains Russian literary texts (classical literature & 20th century) and their translations into Finnish aligned at paragraph level.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through Korp.

Corpus: Classics Library of the National Library of Finland - Kielipankki version
Description: This corpus contains literary texts from 1549 to 1944.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing through FIN-CLARIN.
This corpus contains fiction texts from a journal of undergraduate creative writing at the Faculty of English Language and Literature.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from clarin:el.
